snippet: The driver of the truck carrying injured veterans in Texas, which was hit by a train, has not made himself available to federal investigators.
abstract: Dale Andrew Hayden, driver of Midland, Tex, parade truck carrying wounded veterans that was struck by a train, leaving four veterans dead and injuring several others, has not made himself available to federal investigators, three weeks after incident.
lead_paragraph: The driver of the truck carrying injured veterans in Texas, which was hit by a train, has not made himself available to federal investigators.

headline.seo: Driver in Texas Fatal Parade Crash Has Not Been Interviewed
headline.main: Driver in Fatal Parade Crash Has Not Yet Been Questioned
headline.print_headline: Driver in Fatal Parade Crash Has Not Yet Been Questioned
